list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: crouch or sit with one's knees bent and one's heels close to or touching one's buttocks or the back of one's thighs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I squatted down in front of him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi ngồi xổm xuống trước mặt anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: unlawfully occupy an uninhabited building or settle on a piece of land.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: eight families are squatting in the house
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tám gia đình đang ngồi xổm trong nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: short and thickset; disproportionately broad or wide.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy là cơ bắp và ngồi xổm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a position in which one's knees are bent and one's heels are close to or touching one's buttocks or the back of one's thighs.
a building occupied by people living in it without the legal right to do so.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a basement room in a North London squat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một căn phòng tầng hầm ở phía bắc london squat
